boa_file_added: A user added a file to Boa in a project
boa_file_removed: A user removed a file from Boa in a project
boa_file_updated: A user updated a file in Boa in a project
boa_folder_created: A user created a folder in Boa in a project
boa_folder_selected: A user linked a Boa folder in a project
boa_node_authorized: A user authorized the Boa addon for a project
boa_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Boa addon for a project
boa_node_deauthorized_no_user: Boa addon for a project deauthorized
